title: EVENT LIGHTING
description: Lights add colour and class to your event. We offer Exceptional lighting solutions powered by high-quality effects and personalized service

serviceItems.title: PAR CAN LIGHTS
description: Transform your event with our versatile LED par cans, perfect for uplighting or downlighting to create a stunning visual impact.

serviceItems.title: Compact LED
description: Moving heads to transform your event into a party! Bright, easy to use, and programmable: choose from fast, slow or sound-activated modes. Digital display makes selection a breeze.

title: TENTS
description: Tents elevate venue spaces, adding sophistication and impressing guests. We offer a range of sizes and designs for any event.

serviceItems.title: A-FRAME tents
description: Offering modular A-Frame tents ranging from 10m to 60m, our tents come with customizable features like side-flaps, doors, and windows. With a sturdy construction and no center pole, our tents provide ample space and flexibility for various events and applications

serviceItems.title: HEXAGON tents
description: Elegant design and sturdy build: our hexagonal tents feature aluminum frames, PVC-coated polyester canopies, and various sizes to suit your event needs Stable and reliable, they provide a protected space for any occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, outdoor gatherings, and more.

serviceItems.title: DOME tents
description: Event dome tents offer a unique alternative to traditional expo halls, providing an unparalleled sense of space and a distinguished venue through their distinctive shape and intricate framework.Their versatility and customizability make them ideal for various events, from corporate functions and weddings to festivals and exhibitions, offering a truly memorable experience for attendees.

title: SOUND
description: At Street Vybz Entertainment, we provide customized sound system rentals and live production services for events of all sizes. Our top-quality PA systems include speakers, mixers, and various microphone options to deliver clear, crisp audio. Perfect for weddings, parties, conferences, and more, we ensure seamless sound solutions that enhance any event.
